item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability discovered in Smart Battery A2-25DE, a multifunctional portable charger, firmware version ?<= SECFS-2013-10-16-13:42:58-629c30ee-60c68be6. An attacker can bypass authentication and gain privilege by modifying the login page.
